song.eTitle: Take the World, but Give Me Jesus

verses.verse: Take the world, but give me Jesus; All its Joys are but a name, But His love abideth ever, Through eternal years the same.
verses.refrain: Oh, the height and depth of mercy! Oh, the length and breadth of love! Oh, the fullness of redemption, Pledge of endless life above
verses.verse: Take the world, but give me Jesus, Sweetest comfort of my soul; With my Savior watching o'er me, I can sing, though billows roll.
Take the world, but give me Jesus; In His cross my trust shall be Till, with clearer, brighter vision, Face to face my Lord I see.
